name: Maplefish Lagoon
description:
Welcome to Maplefish Lagoon! Encounter 20 sea creatures, each with a whimsical personality and adorable design. Angle for fish and seashells, upgrade your equipment in search for the mightiest of the sea monsters, or simply relax and enjoy the gorgeous ocean views.

Features:

-Catch fish in a fun, one-button minigame!
-Complete your aquarium by collecting all 20 sea creatures.

-Upgrade your boat, rod, bobble and accessories, and equip your favourites to fish in style!

-Be challenged by the rarest and strongest of the fish, The Sigmafish!
